backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining user profiles, habits, records, diary entries, investment tracking, authorization, and diagnostics with maps and list-based storage.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing features, related files, components, and test IDs for version-restore and initialization verification.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend components, hooks, utilities, and styles.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining OKLCH color tokens for light and dark themes and applying base styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app handling authentication flow, profile loading, and routing to login, profile setup, or dashboard.
frontend/src/components/AuthenticatedIni: Fallback UI shown when authenticated initialization fails, offering retry, reload, and diagnostics display.
frontend/src/components/CollapsibleHabit: Collapsible panel that loads and displays the HabitManager component with loading state handling.
frontend/src/components/DiaryAnalyticsCh: Builds a line chart comparing daily energy levels with habit consistency using diary entries and habit records.
frontend/src/components/DiaryPage.tsx: Provides a diary entry interface with date selection, parsing/saving entry fields, and displays an analytics chart.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: Implements a React error boundary that renders a fallback UI and allows resetting error state.
frontend/src/components/ExportDataPage.t: Loads data for a selected date range and enables exporting all user data to XLSX or PDF.
frontend/src/components/ExportDateRangeP: Renders a dual date picker ensuring valid start/end order and notifies parent of range changes.
frontend/src/components/ExportPreviewSec: Displays preview sections for reflections, habit records, and investment data within an export range.
frontend/src/components/FatalErrorFallba: Shows a full-screen fatal error message with options to reload or retry after an unrecoverable error.
frontend/src/components/HabitGrid.tsx: Renders a scrollable grid of habits by day, mapping records to cells and supporting toggling completion and editing amounts. Manages scroll position and record state for a selected month and year.
frontend/src/components/HabitManager.tsx: Provides UI to create, edit, and delete habits, including name, weekly target, unit, and default amount. Validates inputs and uses backend mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Displays the app header with user info, logout menu, and navigation tabs. Shows view-specific icon and title based on the current selection.
frontend/src/components/InvestmentGoalCa: Shows an individual investment goal with progress, edit and delete dialogs, and form validation. Updates or removes goals via mutation hooks.
Lists investment goals and provides a dialog to create new ones with validation. Fetches goals and displays loading feedback.
frontend/src/components/LoadingTimeoutFa: Displays a fallback screen when loading times out, with backend reachability diagnostics and options to reload or proceed to login. Supports copying detailed diagnostic info.
frontend/src/components/LoginScreen.tsx: Login screen component handling Internet Identity auth state and rendering UI for login and error messages.
frontend/src/components/MonthlyTargetsEd: Displays monthly target and progress totals for applicable habits, computing sums and steady-climb targets.
frontend/src/components/MonthTabs.tsx: Renders horizontally scrollable month selector tabs and notifies parent on month change.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Profile creation form allowing a user to submit their name and save it via backend mutation.
frontend/src/components/ProgressCharts.t: Computes monthly progress stats and renders pie, bar, and line charts for overall and per‑habit performance.
frontend/src/components/TrackerDashboard: Main dashboard managing views, month selection, data fetching, and rendering habit grid, targets, and charts.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity state and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendReachabilit: Hook performing a backend health check using an anonymous actor and reporting reachability status.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication and manages login state using Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useLoadingWatchdog.ts: A hook that triggers a timeout callback if loading takes too long, with optional enabling and cleanup logic.
frontend/src/hooks/usePreserveHorizontal: Preserves and restores an element’s horizontal scroll position across rerenders and updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks wrapping backend actor methods for user profiles, habits, and related mutations with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base configuration defining CSS variables for themes and global styles for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the app.
frontend/src/types/investments.ts: Legacy empty file kept for backward compatibility with investment types.
frontend/src/types/jspdf.d.ts: Empty type declaration file for jspdf.
frontend/src/types/xlsx.d.ts: Empty type declaration file for xlsx.
frontend/src/utils/diagnostics.ts: In-memory diagnostics recorder that logs timestamped events and formats them into a timeline.
frontend/src/utils/diaryAnalytics.ts: Computes daily habit consistency percentages based on habit records and weekly targets.
frontend/src/utils/diaryDates.ts: Utility functions for formatting, parsing, and retrieving dates in YYYY-MM-DD format.
frontend/src/utils/duration.ts: Parses free-text duration strings into seconds, formats seconds back to readable strings, and validates input.
frontend/src/utils/exportFormatters.ts: Formatting helpers for export data including dates, habit units, investment amounts, and durations.
frontend/src/utils/exportPdf.ts: Generates an HTML report for reflections, habits, and investments, then triggers browser print-to-PDF.
frontend/src/utils/exportXlsx.ts: Builds tab‑delimited XLSX-like content for reflections, habits, goals, and investment entries and downloads it as a file.
frontend/src/utils/fileDownload.ts: Creates export filenames and downloads blobs via a temporary link.
frontend/src/utils/habitUnit.ts: Provides helpers for creating, labeling, detecting, and converting habit units.
frontend/src/utils/investments.ts: Formats and parses investment-related dates and amounts and computes goal progress.
frontend/src/utils/reportCsv.ts: Generates CSV content for habit records and downloads it as a file.
frontend/src/utils/reportDateRange.ts: Converts dates to UTC components and constructs normalized date ranges for reports.
frontend/src/utils/reportPdf.ts: Empty placeholder file for PDF report generation.
frontend/src/utils/reportStats.ts: Calculates habit report statistics including completion, daily stats, and volume metrics over a date range.
frontend/src/utils/steadyClimbPlan.ts: Provides monthly Steady Climb fitness targets and maps habit names to their monthly goals.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Handles extracting, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters for routing and state.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining dark mode, content paths, extended color system using CSS variables, custom animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing a consistency tracker app, its architecture, known issues, and required feature rollbacks to Version 35.
